```{r,  include =FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=TRUE)
database <- database()
selected_var <- input$selected_var
```


## Esto es TExto

Lalala
```{r, include =T}
# Aislamos la columna en un objeto
VR <- database[,selected_var]
VR
```


```{r,  include =T}
# Media
mean(VR)
```

```{r,  include =T}
# Mediana
mean(VR)
```

```{r,  include =T}
# Minimo
min(VR)
```

```{r,  include =T}
# Maximo
max(VR)
```


```{r,  include =T}
# Cantidad de Datos
length(VR)
```


```{r,  include =T}
# Varianza
var(VR)
```


```{r,  include =T}
# Desvio Estandard
sd(VR)
```



```{r,  include =T}
# Summary
summary(VR)
```


```{r,  include =T}
# Objeto MEDIDAS
MEDIDAS <- summary(VR)
MEDIDAS
```


```{r,  include =T}
# Solo algunas MEDIDAS
MEDIDAS[c(2,3,5)]
```
